### just a guy making tools

Open-source dev tools by [Tyson George](https://github.com/tgeorge06).

| Project | Description | Install |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| [**lazyide**](https://github.com/tgeorge06/lazyide) | Lightweight terminal-native IDE built in Rust | `curl -fsSL https://tysonlabs.dev/lazyide/install.sh \| sh` |

[tysonlabs.dev](https://tysonlabs.dev)
